abstract: Federal prosecutors announce criminal charges against Rajarengan Rajaratnam nearly two years after his brother, the Galleon Group founder Raj Rajaratnam, was convicted and sentenced to 11 years in prison.
snippet: Federal prosecutors announce criminal charges against Rajarengan Rajaratnam nearly two years after his brother, the Galleon Group founder Raj Rajaratnam, was convicted and sentenced to 11 years in prison.

headline.main: Brother of Galleon Group’s Rajaratnam Is Indicted on Insider Trading Charges
headline.print_headline: Brother of Galleon Group’s Rajaratnam Is Indicted on Insider Trading Charges
